languages.text: "У Лорд-инквизитора должны были быть очень хорошие причины, чтобы поставить Чорда во главе Футфола".
"The Lord Inquisitor must have had very good reasons for putting Chorda in charge of Footfall."
languages.original_text: "У Лорд-инквизитора должны были быть очень хорошие причины, чтобы поставить Чорда во главе Футфола".

traits.locale_text: "The Lord Inquisitor must have had very good reasons for putting Chorda in charge of Footfall."

languages.text: “大审判官肯定是有非常充分的理由，才会让库尔达掌管落脚港。”
languages.original_text: "The Lord Inquisitor must have had very good reasons for putting Chorda in charge of Footfall."

traits.locale_text: “审判长肯定是有非常充分的理由，才会让库尔达掌管落脚港。”
traits.speaker: HeinrixCompanion

languages.text: « Le seigneur inquisiteur avait certainement de très bonnes raisons de confier Castel à Chorda. »
languages.original_text: "The Lord Inquisitor must have had very good reasons for putting Chorda in charge of Footfall."

traits.locale_text: « Le seigneur inquisiteur avait certainement de très bonnes raisons de confier Castel à Chorda. »
traits.speaker: HeinrixCompanion

languages.text: «El Lord Inquisidor debía de tener buenas razones para encomendar a Chorda el mando de Paso».
languages.original_text: "The Lord Inquisitor must have had very good reasons for putting Chorda in charge of Footfall."

traits.locale_text: «El Lord Inquisidor debía de tener buenas razones para encomendar a Chorda el mando de Paso».
traits.speaker: HeinrixCompanion

languages.text: 「ロード・インクィジターがチョーダをフットフォールの担当に指名したのだ、十分な理由があるに違いない」
languages.original_text: "The Lord Inquisitor must have had very good reasons for putting Chorda in charge of Footfall."

traits.locale_text: 「ロード・インクィジターがチョーダをフットフォールの担当に指名したのだ、十分な理由があるに違いない」
traits.speaker: HeinrixCompanion

languages.text: "Der Großinquisitor muss gute Gründe dafür gehabt haben, Chorda die Kontrolle über Footfall zu übertragen."
languages.original_text: "The Lord Inquisitor must have had very good reasons for putting Chorda in charge of Footfall."

traits.locale_text: "Der Großinquisitor muss gute Gründe dafür gehabt haben, Chorda die Kontrolle über Footfall zu übertragen."
traits.speaker: HeinrixCompanion

languages.original_text: "The Lord Inquisitor must have had very good reasons for putting Chorda in charge of Footfall."

languages.text: "Lord Engizisyoncu'nun Chorda'yı Binliman'ın başına koymak için mükemmel sebepleri olmalı."
languages.original_text: "The Lord Inquisitor must have had very good reasons for putting Chorda in charge of Footfall."

traits.locale_text: "Lord Engizisyoncu'nun, Chorda'yı Binliman'ın başına koymak için mükemmel sebepleri olmalı."
traits.speaker: HeinrixCompanion
